reviewText: Another good film which has been slaughtered by the censors.. This version is 86 minutes long . The original version has a length of 100 minutes. So it's cut by only 14 minutes.... What a joke! It is outrageous that some people don't respect the filmmaker's intentions and the adult spectator's right to see an original version. Some people think that they have the right to impose on others their "religious or moral" principles. Please join  the the Talibans and leave us alone. Before I purchased the film I would have wanted to know how long the film was. That way I would have known that is was a truncated version.
